title: The power and the authority of the truth is that it makes you look within and evaluate your reality ...

attachments.displayName:
The power and the authority of the truth is that it makes you look within and evaluate your reality against it (truth) instead of truth conforming to your reality, as we often try to make it do.

Here's a reality check the truth does not depend upon your acceptance of it in order to remain truth, no its truth all by itself, with or without your acceptance.

Know the truth about yourself, LIKE IT OR NOT, its TRUE AND YOU KNOW IT!!! Now what does the Word of God say about your truth?


"Then you will know the truth and the truth shall set you free." John 8:32 KJV

WR, III

object.content: Only Jesus can break the chains ! Hallelujah !
